document_data.name: Drunk sailor
document_data.mainbody: '''Drunk sailor''' was a sailor on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Found near [[Flinn]], this sailor was drinking ale and mistook the [[Kalach-Cha]] to be his friend and asked how was the [[Esmerelle|Kalach-Cha's mother]].
